title: Retailing
creator_contributor_role: Mutual Life and Citizens' Assurance Co., production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Retail trade - Vocational guidance
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising - Australia - History
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Advertising - Australia - History
description: Episode of Series "Is this your career series". A vocational guidance film. Shows the wide variety of departments and discusses the varied opportunities in retailing, including advertising and art. Retailing is an exciting avenue of employment in which people are needed for a wide variety of departments, some into contact with the customers and others handling "behind-the-scenes" jobs. Shows how young people with executive ability may find opportunities in office management, buying, advertising, art and other retailing careers. (Some footage of David Jones store and an old supermarket interior).
